diff_hunk:
@@ -22,5 +22,5 @@
 import sys
 
 # pylint: disable=unused-import,wildcard-import,line-too-long
-from tensorflow.contrib.seq2seq.python.ops import layers
-from tensorflow.contrib.seq2seq.python.ops import loss
+from tensorflow.contrib.seq2seq.python.ops.layers import *
body:
we don't allow this due to namespace pollution; in general we don't allow non-module level imports.  please use layers.... and los... to refer to methods therein.  alternatively inside your function context you can do:

f1 = layers.f1
g1 = loss.g1

and use f1, g2 inside your function.

body_text:
we don't allow this due to namespace pollution; in general we don't allow non-module level imports.  please use layers.... and los... to refer to methods therein.  alternatively inside your function context you can do:
f1 = layers.f1
g1 = loss.g1
and use f1, g2 inside your function.
